title: Whitewash Test
description: Test 'Nordic White' Precolor + 'Super White' Part A on scraps.

title: Bending Jig
description: Cut out two matching template pieces out of 3/4" MDF. Includes alignment slots.

title: Bending Jig Assembly
description: Cut alignment blocks and attach to templates.

title: Frame Piece Breakdown
description: Rough breakdown of 4x frame pieces along the grain to allow kerf bending.

title: Panel Breakdown
description: Rough breakdown + labelling of of remaining panels into pieces that can be further sized on the "MFT" table.
